tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NanoMaterialsToxicity (
  name VARCHAR(255),
  toxicity_level INT,
  research_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatorySubmissions (
  submission_id INT,
  submission_date DATE,
  submission_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE research_documents (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 document_date DATE NOT NULL,
 researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_submissions (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 submission_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 submission_date DATE NOT NULL,
 toxic_material_id INT NOT NULL,
 research_document_id INT NOT NULL
 FOREIGN KEY (toxic_material_id) REFERENCES toxic_materials(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (research_document_id) REFERENCES research_documents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ToxicityStudies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    nano_material_id INT,
    toxicity_rating VARCHAR(50),
    study_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE NanoMaterials (
    nano_material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(100),
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatorySubmissions (
    submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    submission_date DATE,
    regulatory_agency VARCHAR(100),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    specialization VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Findings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_date DATE,
  result TEXT,
  researcher_id INT,
  studio_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE RegulatorSubmissions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  finding_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT
);
